mobile.name: paladin grand knight
mobile.long_description: The Grand Knight is standing here, waiting for someone to help.
mobile.description: The Knight is standing here, smiling at you. He is dressed all in white, blue and silver. He looks VERY strong, as he stands here, ready to help the innocent.

mobile.name: rat large
mobile.long_description: There is a large rat here, poking through the foodstuffs lying around.
mobile.description: The large rat is about two feet long from head to tail and has claws the size of your fingers, looking very nasty. It seems to be quite occupied with all the chewed open foodstuffs lying about the room.

mobile.name: cleaver
mobile.long_description: The Cleaver is here eyeing you hungrily in anticipation of its next meal.
mobile.description: The Cleaver is a huge spidery chittinous creature with four large spindly arms ending in cleaverlike talons that will surely cut you to ribbons.
